name: Roller Coaster Park Simulation
description:
Big roller coaster with a lot of passenger riders is going into the heights of the sky with the maximum pace and great elegance. A roller coaster track which completely looks like a train track is awesome and is capable of taking a lot of people to the joy ride at once. Let’s do this for the maximum enjoyment and extra fun. With the screams of the enjoying crowed and the joyful scenes around the roller coaster, this ride is ultimate park simulation adventure. Let the passengers enjoy and wave their arms in the air.
Roller Coaster Park Simulation features:
• Multiple levels of the roller coaster for full exploring of theme park.
• Ultimate thrill is guaranteed with dangerous roller coaster ride in this game.
• Creative and realistic gameplay
• Let the passengers and tourists in the theme park get aboard I the roller coaster
• Fire up the track with extreme roller coaster speed.
• Speed down at the next station before the roller coaster hits something
• Don’t kill the riders and passengers who are there just for the fun
• From speed control to lane shift, do everything a roller coaster operator actually does.
